* generating data for learning to solve inverse problems

* data augmentation as translation/morphism
  -> given text, rewrite as (style1, style2, ..)

Though it’s traumatic for me to bring this up, I was targeted by a group allied with Turning Point USA in 2018, with the help of Tucker Carlson on Fox. My home address circulated online and I got death threats. 1/

It's also hard because they keep changing things under the hood without communicating a change log. I was having the exact opposite experience with Claude just a few days ago. I saw something recently about anthropic apologizing and rolling something back, didn't see anything suggesting it was this.

reply_context.text: Some of them are absolutely impossible to work with because of it. This is why I stopped using co-pilot
